Alert Name: bush
Congress OKs minimum wage boost
First increase in 10 years approved as part of measure to fund Iraq war; Bush expected to sign it.
05/24/07 09:51 PM, EDT
Congress passed the first increase in the federal minimum wage since 1997 late Thursday as part of the measure for supplemental funds to fight the war in Iraq.
FULL STORY
